description: 10 places. For the moment without services but over time they will make improvements. Maximum 48h. Located on a level esplanade next to the entrance to town. Easy access from the road to enjoy the attractions of the environment. Places of interest: the ruta de la piedra (secrets of popular architecture), the botanical path (unique trees), the redoladas btt route (the mallos bike kingdom btt center) and depending on the season: summer swimming pool, days environmental, ringing, theaters, concerts, cultural offer, etc. Nearby places of interest: loarre castle, adventure sports in the white waters of the Gállego river, riglos climbing, the landscapes of the mallos, the edra cellar, etc. Nearby nuclei to visit while strolling: piedramorrera and erés. Motorhome service area rules of use * the service area is exclusively reserved for motorhomes and vehicles classified as accommodation. Parking for cars, trucks, etc. Forbidden. * the maximum establishment will be 48 hours. * the vehicle must be parked within the limits of the established spaces. * it is forbidden to remove any element such as chairs, tables, barbecues, awnings, etc. from the motorhome. * it is forbidden to throw waste out of its containers. * the room must be kept in a perfect state of cleanliness. * car washing is prohibited in the area. * users must comply with any other type of indication, that the municipal council stipulates for the maintenance, the preservation of the area, the respect and the good neighborliness. * non-compliance with these rules will be penalized

title: (50619) -
description: Ample parking at the beginning of many excursions, next to a river. Land area with several sites, the flatter areas are from the middle.

name: Área de autocaravanas Cabanillas
title: (31511) Área de autocaravanas Cabanillas
description:
Motorhome rest area from July 18, 2023. Fully equipped. 15 well-leveled pitches. Drainage of gray and black water.
Aqueduct with "tokens" but the town hall has decided to leave the service free. The electricity service is not yet operational.
Neighborhood very well lit at night and quiet. The area is integrated into a park with several picnic tables. It has several bins and containers.

title: (50800) Zuera - A-124
description: Parking next to the chapel of Salz, quiet and surrounded by pines and poplars

title: (31530) Cortes - Autovía del Ebro
description: Rest area of the N232 as it passes through Navarra With ample green area, bathrooms, tables ... Car noise Good for overnight

title: (50550) Mallén - 7 Camino Calveta
description: A place of passage, to sleep peacefully. especially recommending Fridays, Saturdays and Sundays. They are the car parks of a warehouse and a center that looks like a sports center, outside the town. It has no shade and it is asphalt. nearby there is an esplanade with some trucks.

title: (22283) Alcalá de Gurrea - Unnamed Road
description: In a pine forest. Nice we had lunch there. Very calm. Possibility to sleep there.

title: (50680) Pardinas de Ceñito - Unnamed Road
description: In a wind farm. Superb spot with a magnificent view and a short sunset, we loved this moment :)

title: (31550) Ribaforada - Autovía del Ebro
description: Rest area with picnic tables and barbecues.

title: (50619) Luesia - Unnamed Road
description: Large free parking during the low season next to the campsite open during the summer. the access is made by a track of several kilometers. the site is beautiful right next to waterfall. picnic tables and bins are at your disposal but no water tap or electricity in the off season. We spent two nights almost alone in the world. Many opportunities for hiking and swimming.

name: Camping Luesia
title: (50619) Camping Luesia
description: Campsite open from spring to summer. You can visit the region the rest of the year, access by dirt road difficult if it rains, it is the price to pay in the region to spend the day.

title: (22283) Alcalá de Gurrea - 2 Carretera Çr Ondas
title_short: (22283) Alcalá de Gurrea - 2 Carretera Çr Ondas
description: Little corner of paradise by the lake, with trees for shade. Perfect location for one night or more. Next to the local yacht club. Full of birds. For short vehicles. U-turn a little "hot" (18 minutes for my 5.40 m)

title: (22283) Tormos -
description: At the edge of a large lake with a clay bottom which gives it a very beautiful place with a splendid panorama, this place is calm and shaded but with a lot of wind. The road to get there is very steep and there is only one place to park.

title: (22283) Tormos -
description: One side of the Sotonera Reservoir. Very quiet place with access by a long track in fair condition. To get there you have to go through a small pine forest. Indicates that camping is prohibited.

title: (22283) Alcalá de Gurrea - 6 Carretera Çr Ondas
title_short: (22283) Alcalá de Gurrea - 6 Carretera Çr Ondas
description: Dirt road, careful with the stones. View over the Sotonera Reservoir. We spent the night alone here. You can access the water (follow the road to the north). Many mosquitoes. There is no shadow. We spent one night at the pass. The other place nearby was not accessible because the water level was very high. There are no services or water supply. I would not get lost with a big RV.

title: (22283) Alcalá de Gurrea - 6 Carretera Çr Ondas
title_short: (22283) Alcalá de Gurrea - 6 Carretera Çr Ondas
description: Beautiful place in the middle of nature and at the water's edge. You can swim here to cool off. Super quiet and place on the water for 4 motorhome/bus ??

title: (22283) Alcalá de Gurrea - 2 Carretera Çr Ondas
title_short: (22283) Alcalá de Gurrea - 2 Carretera Çr Ondas
description: Small location for 2 vans maximum 20m from the lake. Very quiet place. Beautiful sunrise. Possibility of swimming

title: (50596) Barués -
description:
Several places to stop on this very beautiful little path, accessible, except perhaps after a heavy rain!
The only downside is the noise of the wind turbines quite close, but the further you go on the way the less you hear them.

title: (22283) Alcalá de Gurrea - 2 Carretera Çr Ondas
title_short: (22283) Alcalá de Gurrea - 2 Carretera Çr Ondas
description: Next to the reservoir, an area to enjoy a swim or kayak ride. frequented by fishermen. very quiet place. possibility for 1 AC with two vans.

title: (31550) Ribaforada - Autovía del Ebro
description: Parking area day and night, usually used by truck drivers, without services for motorhomes, there is gas station and restaurant; we dined and slept here without problems, so we follow route the next morning.

name: Camping "El Temple"
title: (22281) Camping "El Temple"
description: Is a good and safe stopover camping 10 minutes from motorway. Level parking in schadow under trees & the clean toilet / showers facilities within 20 meters. WIFI free. More for long term residents. Easy accessable camper service point.

title: () Torres de Berrellén - Camino de Alagón
title_short: () Torres de Berrellén - Camino de Alagón
description: Lovely quiet place to sleep, passable track in van and small motorhome. Parked at the edge of the track, no passage during the night and a beautiful view of the surrounding nature and the Erbre.

title: (50650) Gallur - Km. 254 Autopista AP-68
description: Wide parking with shaded areas to spend the night or stop to stretch your legs on a trip. Very quiet, although the noise of the highway is heard a little.

title: (22281) El Temple - 6 Ronda San Isidro
description: Grove area next to the town. A good place to take a short break from the road.

title: (31513) Arguedas - Parque Senda Viva
description: Near Arguedas, above the solar farm, flat by the way. Magnificent view all around, rosemary scent, absolute silence. Exposed to the wind, no facilities. Recommendation for self-sufficient vehicles that can handle the first rather steep and bumpy ascent.

title: (31310) Carcastillo - NA-534
description: Mirador de Larrate. Picnic tables available, a quiet place to picnic and why not spend a night

title: () Fontellas - Calle Barranco
description: Parking of El Bocal, considered place of Cultural Interest of the Imperial Canal of Aragon.

title: (22283) Alcalá de Gurrea - Unnamed Road
description: Spot in nature by the lake. Access is a bit complicated especially after heavy rains. We are on an xtrail with thirty roofs, it was quite simple but favor a high minimum guard (california style van, seems OK to me). Thank you for leaving the place clean, basic it was not ... The locals are not very sensitive to ecology.

title: (31512) Fontellas - 30 Carretera el Bocal
description: Great parking alongside the canal. Wide open space. Pretty footpath and walks nearby. Very calm and peaceful.  Much easier to park here than the car park 2km down the road which was overflowing easter weekend.  Accès road very easy for camping car despite its gravel appearance. Small road nearby for access to Tudela by mountain bike , 7km.

title: (31500) Tudela - NA-134
description: Large rest area / picnic, sheltered tables. Large parking away from the road (follow path), quiet and discreet. Possibility to sleep at least one night (see more, we have not seen anyone). No service. Ideal as a crossing spot. Welcome to the far west!

title: (22283) Alcalá de Gurrea - 2 Carretera Camping
description: Gravel parking, views of the reservoir, many cars during the day, quiet to sleep.

title: (22283) Alcalá de Gurrea - 1 Carretera Camping
description: Parking facing the old campsite. Possibility to spend a quiet night near the nautical base. No service but Picnic tables available.

title: (50650) Boquiñeni - Unnamed Road
description: Parking to stop for the day, to visit the Lobeta reservoir, no shadows or summer tables, lots of heat

title: (31310) Carcastillo - 87 Calle Carretera
description: Area for motorhomes in Carcastillo

name: Estacionamiento de autocaravanas
title: (31513) Estacionamiento de autocaravanas
description: motorhome area with video surveillance inside the senda viva park with the option to book in advance, somewhat uneven but very safe and quiet.

title: (31513) Arguedas -
description: Small square on a hill, next to a large parking lot with a view of Navarra and Balenares

title: (31513) Arguedas - Parque Senda Viva
description: Parking of the park, possibility of spending the night without charge. It is recommended to arrive before the opening of the park or after the closing (10 places more or less)

title: (31513) Arguedas - 21 Calle Raimundo Lanas
description: Parking esplanade in front of the entrance to the Municipal Pools and soccer field.

title: (31513) Arguedas - Calle de las Bardenas
description: Esplanade of land. Many other motorhomes. Close to the sevices area.

title: (31310) - 2003 Diseminado Diseminados
description: Great picnic area, shade, grass, table, river, calm. We just have lunch but the bivouac must be at the top

title: (31513) Arguedas -
description: Right next to the Sandaviva park and at the gates of the Bardenas desert. Pitch on the edge of a small path, for 4 vans or motorhomes. Very quiet and flat. Perfect for 1 night.

name: Oil Artajo SL
title: (31512) Oil Artajo SL
description: Private area located within the estate of aceiteartajo, producers of extra virgin olive oil. It is necessary to book in advance in the website, in the section 'Autocaravanas'.  (website visible for park4night PRO users). It has black and grey waste water recreational area with tables, and a free guides tour to the state and oil mill. It's not allowed to camp (with shade canopy, tables and chairs). It's forbidden to light fires.

title: (31513) Arguedas - 65 Calle Val
description:
The emptying point is located 50 meters from the car park. With gray and black water outlet. Advantage: very close to Bardenas desert.
View of the cliff dwellings, but walk along the path in front of the houses slightly towards the city, these are worth a visit. Village is not much but bakery and small spruce 750 meters. Good food at bar-restaurant Mallen. In the courtyard in the center. Bulls through the city at Easter....

title: (50561) Bisimbre - N-122
description: Small rest area next to the road. It has tables and benches and trees.

title: (50630) Alagón, Zaragoza -
description: Location (for a van or even 2 Max) on the edge of the track near fields. Easy access by gravel road. Set back from the houses, calm and nice view. Fishermen and hikers early in the morning but not bothersome

title: (31513) Arguedas - Parque Senda Viva
description: Near the desert of Bardenas / Inn / barbecue. Possibility at the hostel

title: (50690) Pedrola - 276 N-232
description: Rest area on the A-68 motorway with a 24-hour service station and restaurant (Good prices)

title: (31513) Arguedas - Parque Senda Viva
description: Parking without services. Magnificent panorama.

title: (50693) Torres de Berrellén - Carretera Tudela - Alagón
title_short: (50693) Torres de Berrellén - Carretera Tudela - Alagón
description: Small location found in a hurry before the night falls, the one near the ruined house is already taken ... We spent a beautiful night at the water's edge! We have seen people fishing so fisherman's corner is for you !! Very quiet despite the road nearby! No vis à vis, very nice to eat and for the shower !!

name: Camping municipal de Agüero,peña sola
title: (22808) Camping municipal de Agüero,peña sola
description: Aguero, 25 Calle Carretera. Below the village, facing the Mallos d'Aguero. Municipal camping of Agüero. Shady. Sanitary. Village cafe. Random schedules.

title: (50638) Cabañas de Ebro - 447 Avenida Figueruelas
description: Only to park the motorhome, near the train station and exits on the Ebro road, 20m from the industrial warehouse, and free lots or with cultivated fields, it is the municipal swimming pool parking lot, we spent the night and the next day the ac was parked 8h

title: (50686) Gordún -
description: Open field at a height with beautiful views on both sides. At the foot of a medieval castle ruin. The place is flat and you can park there with several (about 4) 4x4 cars. We found the route to it doable with a unimog with camper unit. Very quiet and we haven't encountered any people yet.

title: (22808) Agüero - 25 Calle Canteron
description:
Parking area at the bottom of the village of Agüero. View of the mallos de Agüero.
Along the road, but little traffic.
Every hour the bells ring but if you have a heavy sleep it's fine.

Playground 2' walk away. Fountain at the playground.
Garbage cans near the site.

title: (22808) Agüero - HU-534
description: The hermitage of Santiago, next to the town of Agüero, very quiet place, there is parking without any service.

title: (31310) Carcastillo - NA-128
description: Free, tarmac and shaded car park located in front of the La Oliva monastery next to the Bardénas Réales desert. Presence of garbage cans. Quiet night.

title: (22808) Murillo de Gállego - Calle Lacos
description: 1full view on the riglos

title: (22807) Ayerbe - A-125
description: Behind the sanctuary, for a small camper, van, many picnic tables. Peaceful place. Very nice.

title: (22808) Murillo de Gállego - A-132
description: Deskali

title: (22808) Agüero - 3 Diseminado Afueras
description: Very peaceful location. Starting point for hiking and mountain biking. 4G Bouygues and SFR at the top.

title: (50810) Ontinar de Salz - 8 Paseo del Generalísimo
title_short: (50810) Ontinar de Salz - 8 Paseo del Generalísimo
description: Charming little shaded square with bench and trash can in a small village. Surrounded by bar and food. Parking space all along the square.

title: (31500) Tudela - 9 Calle Canal de Navarra
description: Large quiet parking

title: (50690) Pedrola - 4 Calle Río Ebro
description: Parking to leave the vehicle except on Tuesdays from 6 a.m. to 3 p.m. because there is a market. It has a park next to it with a source of drinking water. In the area there are supermarkets, bars, bakeries, pharmacy ... Very quiet area.

title: (50630) Alagón - Unnamed Road
description: Place in the middle of nature between the river and an orchard next to a small ruined house access to the river and sun at the end of the day no prohibition but certainly private we spent a very quiet night without any problem.

title: (31500) Tudela - Autovía del Ebro
description: Parking lot of a large supermarket, being very tired we decided to stop for 1 night which went very well and then join bardenas. The road makes noise and the place is not necessarily ideal but allows you to rest and enjoy the WC, shop and petrol station in the early morning.

title: (31500) Tudela - 4 NA-126
description: At the entrance to the town of Tudela, vacant lot on the banks of the Ebro. No table available but enough room to settle ..

title: (31500) Tudela - 14B Paseo Pamplona
description: Dirt parking next to the river, a quiet place to sleep, although on weekends it fills up with cars. It must be taken into account if the river rises, park only on the paved upper one, if there are no river rises, the ground floor parking lot is better and quieter. There is a tapas bar near Casa Alberto and it has a great menu.

title: (31513) Arguedas - 39 Calle Carlos Arias
description: Calm and quiet night despite the proximity of the road, opposite the restaurant, cleaner than the gravel parking lot in the city center when the parking lot for motorhomes is full or when you want to be alone and quiet.

title: (31500) Tudela - Av. del Barrio
description: LAUNDRY

title: (31500) Tudela - 10 Avenida Instituto
description: Large dirt parking lot where there are trucks parked. Behind the Alcampo supermarket, and a laundry opposite the supermarket. We ate, shopped and washed.

title: (31500) Tudela - 89 Paseo del Cristo
description: Free parking, quiet and close to the city center. Next to the banks of the Ebro.

title: (22808) Murillo de Gállego - Unnamed Road
description: 1km of path for an incredible spot. calm

title: (31500) Tudela - 2 Avenida Zaragoza
description: Automatic laundry, inside the commercial passage. the surrounding streets are pedestrianized so it is not possible to access directly with the motorhome. While the laundry is done you can walk around the surroundings, which are beautiful, have a skewer, etc.

title: (50650) Gallur -
description: Super wild, birds, very calm, highway noise sometimes if distant wind, and wind noise if high wind. Magnificent landscape, slightly muddy water bottom. Unfortunately some rare rubbish. Almost 4x4 access and limited to van form. Rut road but possible to park close to the lake

title: (22808) Murillo de Gállego -
description: Overnight space for a maximum of 3 mobile homes. Partial view of the Los Mallos. Space should really only be used for sleeping.

title: (50640) Luceni - Unnamed Road
description: Solitary reservoir KiteSurf paradise The access is fine but a bit far-fetched x slopes. Recently they have marked it a bit. I don't know if you can legally sleep there. There are no services at all and it hits you comfortably. Take shoes for the water and enjoy the solitude Obviously, leave everything better than how it was when you arrived, although, by the way, it is quite little taken care of by the locals
